| History                 = The Boxers were highly-trained high-tech assassins who worked for the [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]]. Assassins whom fought with speed and martial arts agility. They were equipped with [[Boxers' Battle Suit|battle suits]] and weaponry, that combined with their training and skills, allowed them to go toe-to-toe with the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]].

During the multi-sided gang war in [[Sydney]] brought about by the assassination of [[Miles Warbeck (Earth-616)|Viceroy]], the crime overlord of [[Australia]], they battled the X-Men and rival crime syndicates. When the X-Men revealed to the [[Sydney Triad (Earth-616)|Sydney Triad]]'s ruling council that the [[Examiner (Earth-616)|Examiner]] was the one who murdered Triad boss [[Gow Yang Ju (Earth-616)|Gow Yang Ju]] and framed [[Remy LeBeau (Earth-616)|Gambit]], they took the Examiner into custody.{{r|X-Treme X-Men Vol 1 7}}
| Equipment               = [[Boxers' Battle Suit|High-tech Battle Suits]], Rappelling equipment{{r|X-Treme X-Men Vol 1 7}}
